```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
# loading data
loan_data <- read_csv("data/lending_club_loans.csv")
grades <- read_csv("data/grade_info.csv")
states_info <- read_csv("data/state_names_info.csv")
```

```{r}
# investigating data
glimpse(loan_data)
glimpse(grades)
glimpse(states_info)
```

```{r}
# joining df's
loan_data <- loan_data %>% 
  rename(state_abb = addr_state) %>% 
  left_join(states_info, by = "state_abb") %>% 
  left_join(grades, by = "sub_grade")
```
